answers.answer: My last was horizontal they called it transverse and they wouldn't spin him they did a c section :-(
I did the work out and it works I just hope he stays that way !

question: So I read on spinning babies about the forward leaning inversions and I've done it 2 times and now baby is on his head! It works now I have diabetes and high BP I'm going to see my Dr in a bit :( I don't want to b induced
title: baby position horizontal on belly 37 weeks!
